subject: RE: Price rise on the quote platform

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Pending
Joel Maligalig assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body: @joel - just creating this into a ticket. Cheers

Hi Heath, we’d like to add 1% to jobs below $5k and 2% to jobs of $5k and above.
As Dan said, if we need to have you spend some time developing this, then we should proceed with that development. It’s something we want to turn on and off and be able to vary the amount of the increase on a regular basis
Thanks


Kind Regards,

David McLean
General Manager
Advantage Property Styling

Follow us on:
<https://www.facebook.com/AdvantageStyling/> <https://www.instagram.com/advantagestyling/>

P 02 9310 1611 | M 0410 567 287
Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street, BANKSMEADOW NSW 2019
www.advantagestyling.com.au <http://www.advantagestyling.com.au/>

<https://advantagestyling.com.au/>



Can we apply it

From: Heath Maguire <heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>>
Sent: Monday, 20 September 2021 11:50 AM
To: David McLean <Davidm@advantagestyling.com.au <mailto:Davidm@advantagestyling.com.au>>
Cc: Joel Maligalig <joel@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:joel@wolfiq.com.au>>; Dan Gerber <dan@advantagestyling.com.au <mailto:dan@advantagestyling.com.au>>
Subject: Re: Price rise on the quote platform

Thanks David,

Yes, some of the pricing increases were made to the base pricing though i.e. updated at the catalogue level and not as markups. I don’t want to confuse the two. There have have been a quite a few changes the markups in between now and 2019.

If you use the base pricing that shows up on a new quote now, let me know how much you want that increased for jobs above and below an initial rental value of $5k. We will filter out the essentials quotes and not affect existing ones. I think this will be the best way and we can then ‘fill in the gaps’ to make the calculations work.

Thanks,
Heath Maguire
CREATIVE DIRECTOR

Phone: 1300 072 134 <tel:1300%20072%20134>
Mobile: 0415 162 271 <tel:0415%20162%20271>

On 20 Sep 2021, at 11:36 am, David McLean <Davidm@advantagestyling.com.au <mailto:Davidm@advantagestyling.com.au>> wrote:

Thanks for the update Heath. I’m sure it’s more complicated than I imagined. I just though these smarts had already been developed.
I know the previous price increases since 2019 were across the board. They excluded Essentials and didn’t affect pending quotes. The last increase (around Feb this year), we had a 1 % increase on jobs under $5k and an extra 2% increase on jobs above $5k. I’m hoping we can just replicate those smarts.
thanks

Kind Regards,

David McLean
General Manager
Advantage Property Styling

From: Heath Maguire <heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>>
Sent: Monday, 20 September 2021 11:28 AM
To: David McLean <Davidm@advantagestyling.com.au <mailto:Davidm@advantagestyling.com.au>>
Cc: Joel Maligalig <joel@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:joel@wolfiq.com.au>>; Dan Gerber <dan@advantagestyling.com.au <mailto:dan@advantagestyling.com.au>>
Subject: Re: Price rise on the quote platform

Hi David,

Happy Monday!

Fair question, allow me to clarify.

The previous pricing increase function is based across all inventory and works on a set percentage increase for orders more than $5k. There is a currently a 3% increase in play FYI.

We have to add in the ability to markup quotes that are below $5k and also to filter out quotes with essentials products in them. We also have the added complexity of not affecting existing quotes which have the 3% markup. So from your perspective, it seems easy to add 2%, but there are a few moving parts if that makes sense?

You can mark up individual quotes by adding a negative number in the hidden discount field. I know you are hesitant to tell the stylists about the markups, but this would require no code level changes and could empower them to assist in your endeavour to increase average order value during more peak times.

Just a suggestion, let me know your thoughts.

Thanks,
Heath Maguire
CREATIVE DIRECTOR

Phone: 1300 072 134 <tel:1300%20072%20134>
Mobile: 0415 162 271 <tel:0415%20162%20271>
Email: heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>

Thanks for the quick response Heath.
This is something that we will want to do on a regular basis. Can you just help me to understand why the smarts aren’t already there. I thought you built the hidden price rise facility back in 2019. Is it because of the recent changes to the quote platform?


Kind Regards,

David McLean
General Manager
Advantage Property Styling

On 17 Sep 2021, at 5:05 pm, David McLean <davidm@advantagestyling.com.au <mailto:davidm@advantagestyling.com.au>> wrote:

Hi Heath and Joel, We’d like to implement a short term price rise on the quote platform.
Are we able to add to the existing hidden price increases already on the platform a further :
1% to jobs under $5k and
2% for jobs of $5k and over.
Essentials is excluded from the increase and any pending quotes would also be excluded from the increase.

We’ll most likely revert to the current pricing in the first week of November, but I’ll confirm that at a later point.
If we are able to do it as soon as possible and if you could let me know when it’s done
Thank you

Kind Regards,

David McLean
General Manager
Advantage Property Styling
